script1.segment1: In a dense forest a lion was roaming around in search of prey to satisfy his hunger and come across a bear.
script1.segment2: The lion immediately gave chase and the bear ran as fast as its legs could carry it through the dense underbrush nearby trees.
script1.segment3: The lion gained on the bear and was about to pounce when the bear suddenly darted to the side and escaped the lion's clutches.
script1.segment4: The lion was left frustrated and defeated with his failed attempt to catch the bear for his lunch that day already over.

script2.segment1: A bear was out foraging for berries and nuts in a forest when suddenly a lion appeared from behind a tree trunk.
script2.segment2: The bear immediately sensed danger and took off running with the lion hot on its heels through the forest underbrush quickly.
script2.segment3: The bear zigzagged through the trees and managed to evade the lion's snapping jaws by mere inches several times already.
script2.segment4: Finally the bear saw a narrow opening and squeezed through it to safety leaving the lion to give up the chase outside.

script3.segment1: In the heart of a dense jungle a fierce lion was stalking its prey a bear that had wandered into its territory.
script3.segment2: The lion crouched low to the ground and began to creep forward with stealth and precision towards the unsuspecting bear slowly.
script3.segment3: But just as the lion was about to pounce the bear suddenly caught sight of it and took off in a sprint away.
script3.segment4: The lion gave chase but ultimately failed to catch the bear which had escaped into a nearby thicket safely again today.

script4.segment1: A lion and a bear lived in the same forest and one day their paths crossed in a chance encounter suddenly.
script4.segment2: The lion seeing an opportunity for a meal began to stalk the bear with caution and patience slowly over time.
script4.segment3: But the bear was not easy prey and it detected the lion's presence quickly and decided to take off running fast.
script4.segment4: The lion pursued but eventually lost interest and gave up the chase deciding to hunt for easier prey elsewhere then.
